name: Allwin Williams
intro: Allwin is an Interaction Design student and loves to explore the internet, music, and electronics.

name: Archita Johari
talk: Visualising DNA sequences as abstract art
intro: Archita is a Biotech engineer and is currently pursuing Master's in design at Srishti institute, Bangalore. She is exploring the intersection of art, biology and computing. And enjoys making illustrations.

name: N Chandrasekhar Ramanujan
talk: Using creative code methods to prototype novel device interactions - case study of a sewing machine
intro: Chandra is a  Product Designer and Researcher. based in Pondicherry. He wants to help build digital products that are good for society and help people achieve their goals.

name: Pixelkar नितान्त
intro: Pixelkar is a Computational Artist. He believes 'What We Experience is a mere Abstraction of the Algorithms Narrated by Creator'.

name: Vinay & Mrityunjay (ayahi)
talk: Walkthrough of SOMNI: an immersive and interactive walkway of light and sound
intro: Vinay & Mrityunjay (ayahi) are an experiential art atelier creating interactive, immersive and multimedia experiences.
